item.title: Real-time state estimation in a flight simulator using fNIRS :bar_chart:
item.description: Gateau, T., Durantin, G., Lancelot, F., Scannella, S. and Dehais, F., 2015. Real-time state estimation in a flight simulator using fNIRS. PloS one, 10(3), p.e0121279.
